item.title: Email to French law professor Yves Strickler
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Bonne Année! Date sent: January 27, 2023, 16:53 (Beijing time) To: Yves Strickler Cc: Many people including the FBI and the State Department, I will update this section later Dear Professor Strickler, Thank you for reminding me to pay close attention to compliance. You are absolutely right! Please don’t worry if you don’t immediately have the time to read all of the emails I am CCing to you regarding the pattern of racketeering activity McDonald’s Corporation has engaged into.

item.title: Florence HERMITE
item.description: Florence HERMITE Florence HERMITE might have been notified while she was working for the French Prime Minister Édouard PHILIPPE. She is currently working as Justice Attaché (Magistrat de liaison) at the French Embassy in the United States.

item.title: Eric Andrieu, lawyer, Péchenard & Associés
item.description:
Translation coming soon.

Le 27 octobre 2015, je reçois un email de l’avocat de McDonald’s France Éric Andrieu du cabinet Péchenard & Associés.

https://archive20210730.auxjournalistes.com/docs/emails/McDonaldsReceivedFrom/2015-10-27-16h00-Eric_Andrieu_Avocat_McDonalds_France_Redacted.pdf

L’avocat commet une faute exceptionnellement grave en confirmant “à [ses] clients que l’opération [note: en réalité une escroquerie] était conforme aux règles des droits français et européen.” C’est bien évidemment faux. Soit il est incompétent, soit il est complice.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe and General Counsel
item.description:
On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe.

From: Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com

Subject: France Monopoly Game Query

Date received: October 23, 2015 at 05:34 +0800 (Beijing time)

To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

item.title: Françoise de Borda, former general counsel of McDonald’s France
item.description:
Via certified mail with proof of receipt requested

From: Françoise de Borda To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

If I recall correctly, a copy of the mail was sent to a French Ministerial Officer who I now accuse of being corrupted.

Translation coming soon. (Note of 2023-04-13: quick note, this even happened in 2012 and I published it, if I am not mistaken, on 2022-09-21T20:49:00+08:00. Back then I wrote “translation coming soon” but I currently don’t have time to translate what was said in French. It’s an important event but not that important compared to what I am currently explaining to the FBI which is the priority.)

Françoise de Borda, directrice juridique de McDonald’s France, me réponds pour la première et pour la dernière fois. Elle ment.
